scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ..
scripts.start: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: cd client && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
